vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for a bank or savings and loan office with a drive-in window use on property zoned a GR General Retail Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 193, the Oak Lawn Special Purpose District, on the east corner of Lemmon Avenue and Inwood Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a ten-year period with eligibility for automatic renewal for additional ten-year periods; subject to a site plan and conditions
Z201-152(PD)
